remotepingprobe.description:
Represents information about a remote ping probe that is governed by a different
set of permissions.

controllerID.description: The controller ID that manages the ping report.

namespace.description:
The namespace where the ping report is stored. Only applicable when the remote
controller is empty.

namespaceType.description:
Type of the namespace reported. It can be hash or plain, depending on various
factors.

probeID.description: The ID of the probe. Only applicable when the remote controller is empty.
